actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Defense to close or realign any military installation if he determines that such action is in the public interest.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Defense to close or realign any military installation during any 24-month period after a budget reflecting a budget deficit is submitted by the President. Authorizes the Secretary to design and construct any facilities deemed necessary to accomplish such closure or realignment.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Defense to close or realign any military installation if he determines that such action is in the public interest.
